question.text: At the next {Shots on target}, keep following that team. Use left/right only; 'Trigger: {Shots on target} by left/right', then 'Then: <Event> by left/right' for {Shots on target, Throw-in, Corner and Shots off target}.

answer.text: Trigger: Shots on target by right
Then: Shots on target by right
Then: Shots off target by right
